org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser
Class BrowserView

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.junit.canvas.View
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.BrowserView
All Implemented Interfaces:
CssGssViewSupport, DOMView, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
public class BrowserView
extends View
implements org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable, CssGssViewSupport, DOMView

A realization of a View on the browser using Safari JavaScript CANVAS and DOM Level 2 CSS
